name: TuyaSmartBLEKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__

  #import <YYModel/YYModel.h>
  #import "TuyaSmartBLEKit.h"
  #import "TYBLEPrivateConf.h"
  #import "TYBLENotificationKeys.h"
  #import <TYBluetooth/TYBluetooth.h>
  
  #undef TYLog
  #undef TYSDKLogDebug
  #undef TYSDKLogInfo
  #undef TYSDKLogWarn
  #undef TYSDKLogError
  #define TYSDKLogDebug(...)         TYSDKLog(0, @"TuyaSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogInfo(...)         TYSDKLog(1, @"TuyaSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogWarn(...)         TYSDKLog(2, @"TuyaSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogError(...)         TYSDKLog(3, @"TuyaSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYBLELogInfo(id, step, ...)         TYSDKLogInfo(@"-> %@ -> %@ -> %@", id, step, __VA_ARGS__)
    
    #define TYBleLogDebug(...)           TYSDKLog(0, @"TuyaSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
    #define TYBleLogInfo(...)           TYSDKLog(1, @"TuyaSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
    #define TYBleLogWarn(...)           TYSDKLog(2, @"TuyaSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
    #define TYBleLogError(...)           TYSDKLog(3, @"TuyaSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
#endif
